alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harrison, central Meade, southwestern Jefferson, north central Hardin and west central Bullitt Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brandenburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Harrison, southwestern Jefferson, west central Bullitt, central Meade and north central Hardin Counties, including the following locations... Mauckport, Laconia, Cupio, Rosewood, Evans Landing, Fishtown, New Boston, Rock Haven, Grahamton and Stites. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
